name: Tower builder
description:
Build the highest tower of blocks in this funny stack game.
Building your construction seems easy, but it takes some skills, balance games and best timing for build the highest skyscraper from stacking blocks.
It's okay if the tower falls, you can enjoy the view of the falling tower blocks.

How to Play
● Tap to drop a block.
● Stack blocks up and construct a tower.
● Monitor the balance and the declination of the tower.
● Undo the mistake if you do it.
● Stacking blocks

Tower blocks game features
● Easy and fun to play, hard to predict the result.
● Multiple scenes, environment and weathers.
● The music is awesome.
● Physics-based, test your tower balance skills.
● Magnificent collapse of a stacking blocks.

Please, just enjoy best of building games :) You are welcome.
